sentence: This was our third trip to Jebel Ali and I feel it will be our last trip unles there is major refurbishment the rooms are looking old and worn and in general the hotel would benefit from a major refurbishment
Regrettably I asked for a room in the ground floor but unbeknown to me a wedding party and works party took preference over guests comfort blaring loud music

What can I say a very special evening for my wifes birthday last Thursday evening which really was over and above what could have expected as we walked up to the Divaz restaurant we had no idea that we would have a table to ourselves on the top deck wow just wonderful
Building and rooms are a bit old in general the structure looks old
This means the views seawards are not great and there is not much to explore outside the hotel without a meaningful taxi ride even if cab prices are very reasonable2
A couple of niggles there is not much storage space for clothes or luggage in the standard rooms so we ended up living out of our suitcases
I have seen some reviews from others complaining about the size of the room but we had no complaints
The rooms are small and very noisy
Old and dirty rooms
Small rooms and bathrooms
We had a 3 yr old travelling with us and he used the creche on a couple of mornings and loved it and also attended the mini disco on Friday nights 730pm to 830pm
I was lucky enough to stay in room 910 again and had a terrace with table and chairs and of course got to feed the peacocks each morning as i drank my coffee

I hope the hotel recognise this we were room 125 Tip 2 no need to pack shampoo body wash conditioner or body lotion you get Espa products daily restocked and they are lovely my hubby did not use them but I loved them and felt very pampered
There are good spirits bottled beers and wines etc although if you want the high end stuff it is clear with prices to pay
Our room was newly decorated with a stylish bathroom despite it being an older hotel
There was a lovely bar are the top of the hotel with amazing views but unfortunately under 21s were not allowed in
Every time we came back to our room it was like new and care had been taken with our belongings
Gretz room 49 and thanks for everything
We stayed in the leading room type garden view and it was more than sufficient
Band playing most nights on the 7th floor gets very busy but open until 2 am there is a lady playing the piano most nights near the dining room she is excellent and always looks lovely too
The staff absolutely make this hotel I would request from my room for a golf buggy to the swimming pool or even the pool and the staff make conversation and are always so helpful
Good quality toiletries the most luxurious large bath sheet towels and flannels
Rooms are imaculate clean and very comfortable Staff are very helpful and nothing is too much trouble all staff are friendly and you are greeted with a smile
The room was lovely and clean with fresh water provided daily
We stayed in room 151 which we found small for a family of 4 with 2 young children
The room was so nice and good taken care of by our friendly room attendant Naim
Naim was the best room atendent ever
Room had everything you might need views were lovely we were impressed
Overall we ’ve had a great time and enjoyed our stay The rooms are clean modern and tidied everyday to a high standard
Hotel has lovely pools and plenty of loungers on the terraces and on the beach
